trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur is facing a dire tool shortage.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the masonry supervisor at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to the masonry supervisor.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SEQ_03<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the masonry supervisor at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the masonry supervisor)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I wanted to see. We have a shortage of tools at Masons' Work, and I was hoping you could help shore up our supplies.

TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>This is rather an urgent task, as I would rather not have everyone idle for too long. Go speak with the supervisor at Masons' Work to find out exactly what we need.

TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_005<tab>You're the one helping us with the new tools? I'm glad to have you─we didn't expect so many eager hands to join us, and now we have to make them productive. So let's get right to it.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_010<tab>We need hammers, and lots of them. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_011<tab>We need measuring tools, and lots of them. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_012<tab>We need polish for the stone, and lots of it. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You obtain additional crafting materials from the crate.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_040<tab>Finished yet? I hope so─our workers are getting restless without a task to keep them busy.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_CITIZENA05345_000_041<tab>Ah, these will do. These will do splendidly! I'll pass these around straightaway.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_050<tab>With the right tools in the right hands, everything seems to be back on schedule.

TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_055<tab>This is among the largest projects I have ever helped oversee, and there simply are not enough experienced stonemasons to meet our demand. So we have begun teaching the new volunteers.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_056<tab>Such skills are not learned overnight, as you well know, and every mason worth his salt has his fair share of worn-down tools to thank for his mastery.
TEXT_BANYOK110_05345_VUYARGUR_000_060<tab>What you made us today will be put through its paces, you can be sure. If we need more─and I have a feeling we will─I hope we can count on you again.
